name: JAD (itch)
description:
Welcome to Just another Dogfight. A classic shoot them up made with love.

It is may very first publication as a game developper and I hope you will enjoy playing it as much as I did enjoy making it.

To play just use the arrows and the spacebar. 

Tips: keeping spacebar pressed is autogire but to have a better fire rate press and release the fastest possible.(just for the fans of clicking)

Each wave become harder and harder. How far will you go ? (post your better score if you dare)

All your comments to improve the game are welcome and all donations will go to buy assets.

Most of the graphics are my own and the others and the sounds are from Kenny's assets. If you are interested by the assets just ask.
